title: I'm A Celeb star Amy Willerton is five months pregnant with first child
text:
Get the biggest I'm a Celebrity stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Amy Willerton has announced that she is expecting her first child with fiancé Daniel Day.



The model and former I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here ! contestant fell pregnant shortly after the pair got engaged in March.



Amy, 27, described the news as the 'most wonderful' engagement present they could have asked for.



In an interview with Hello! Magazine , Amy said she and Darren are now considering postponing their upcoming wedding until after the arrival of their child, saying they "want to get it right".

(Image: PA)





She added: "Our wedding is about telling our friends and family that we want to be together forever and what counts is that our little baby will be with us. That's really special."

Amy and Daniel got engaged in March this year, but the romantic moment didn't go quite to plan.

Former Miss Universe Great Britain Amy revealed that she made Daniel pop the question twice because he 'got it wrong' the first time round.

(Image: WENN)

Daniel asked Amy to be his wife during a romantic ski holiday in the Alps, but she told him it didn't count because he was down on two knees rather than just one.

Amy told Hello! magazine: "The second time around I made him do it on one knee because I didn't know if proposing on both knees counted."

Amy got her big modelling break when she was discovered by Katie Price as a teenager.

(Image: Rex)

She appeared on Sky Living show Signed by Katie, which saw hopefuls compete for a management contract with a company owned by Price .

Amy went on to win the show but fell out with mentor Katie.

Luckily the fall out didn't harm Amy's career too much.

She went on to win Miss Universe and appeared on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2013, where she finished in fifth place.



Amy's full interview is available in Hello! magazine, out now.
description: The I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here fell pregnant shortly after getting engaged this year
